duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver engaging and informative science lessons to sixth-grade students at O’Donnell Middle School.
Develop curriculum materials and lesson plans that align with state standards and educational best practices.
Assess student learning through various forms of assessment and provide constructive feedback to support student growth.
Collaborate with colleagues and parents to support student learning and well-being.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Education or related field (Master's preferred)
